### First Section

I claim absolutely no credit for this visualization, which I consider one of the most best I have ever seen.  All credit belongs to the <a href = "http://www.nytimes.com/interactive/2011/05/31/business/economy/case-shiller-index.html">original source</a>.  If anybody believes this to be not fair use, I will take it down immediately.  I am implicitly assuming approval for this fork due to the [data.stories interview](http://datastori.es/data-stories-22-nyt-graphics-and-d3-with-mike-bostock-and-shan-carter/)
